Reviews.Title: “If you don't want to sleep much go to M68”
Reviews.Author: Moonbabyxox
Reviews.Content: chose hotel location stayed 34 nights clean bed broken light bulbs ceiling blinking annoyingly bathroom attached walk corridor clean chance sleep 7 am cos pub downstairs serve breakfast 7 am play music noise building heard door etc allow smoking bathroom downstairs smells hotel including pleasant staff isnt professional friendly
